amendment.description: Amendment originally sought to reduce the funds appropriated in the bill to the former Soviet states by $30 million. \ As amended by the Wilson substitute amendment (A011), the funds appropriated to the former Soviet states were reduced by $15 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed as amendment No. 70 in the Congressional Record of June 22, 1995, to reduce the funds appropriated in the bill to the former Soviet states by $30 million, from $595 million to $565.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (FL) amendment (A010) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
